name: casibase (casibase)
description: [项目级] ⚡️AI Cloud OS: Open-source enterprise-level AI knowledge base and MCP (model-context-protocol)/A2A (agent-to-agent) management platform with admin UI, user management and Single-Sign-On⚡️, supports ChatGPT, Claude, Llama, Ollama, HuggingFace, etc., chat bot demo: https://ai.casibase.com, admin UI demo: https://ai-admin.casibase.com。来源: https://github.com/casibase/casibase

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
⚡️AI Cloud OS: Open-source enterprise-level AI knowledge base and MCP (model-context-protocol)/A2A (agent-to-agent) management platform with admin UI, user management and Single-Sign-On⚡️, supports ChatGPT, Claude, Llama, Ollama, HuggingFace, etc., chat bot demo: https://ai.casibase.com, admin UI demo: https://ai-admin.casibase.com

来源: https://github.com/casibase/casibase
语言: Go
Stars: 4442

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: <https://casibase.org/docs/basic/server-installation>

genes.content:
